Rule.Name: UCMcomponentNoCycle
Rule.Description: UCM component must not be part of a containment cycle

Rule.Name: UCMpluginNoOutBinding
Rule.Description: UCM plugin bindings of this stub must all have out-bindings

Rule.Name: UCMpluginNoInBinding
Rule.Description: UCM plugin bindings of this stub must all have in-bindings

Rule.Name: UCMsyncStubIsDyn
Rule.Description: UCM synchronizing stub must be dynamic

Rule.Name: UCMblockingStubIsSync
Rule.Description: UCM blocking stub must be synchronizing

Rule.Name: UCMstaticStubTooManyPlugins
Rule.Description: UCM static stub must not have more than one plug-in

Rule.Name: UCMstaticStubPreconditions
Rule.Description: UCM static stub must have a true precondition for its plugin binding

Rule.Name: UCMstaticStubReplication
Rule.Description: UCM static stub must have replicationFactor=1 for its plugin binding

Rule.Name: UCMstubSingletonWithReplication
Rule.Description: UCM stub containing a singleton map must have replicationFactor=1 for its plugin binding

Rule.Name: UCMcomponentBindingContextIsTeam
Rule.Description: UCM component target of a binding must be of kind Team

Rule.Name: UCMprocessWithObjectAncestor
Rule.Description: UCM process component should not have an object component ancestor

Rule.Name: UCMresponsibilityInManyComponents
Rule.Description: UCM responsibility should not be bound to more than one component
Rule.Constraint: self.respRefs -> iterate(ref; comp:Set(urncore::Component)=Set{} | if (ref.contRef <> null) then comp->union(ref.contRef.contDef.oclAsType(urncore::Component)->asSet()) else comp endif ) -> asSet() -> size() <= 1

Rule.Name: UCMsubCompInManyComponents
Rule.Description: UCM component should not be bound to more than one component
Rule.Constraint: self.contRefs -> iterate(ref; comp:Set(urncore::Component)=Set{} | if (ref.parent <> null) then comp->union(ref.parent.contDef.oclAsType(urncore::Component)->asSet()) else comp endif ) -> asSet() -> size() <= 1

Rule.Name: UCMconnectBindings
Rule.Description: UCM wait/timer/end/empty points in a connect must be bound to the same component reference
Rule.Constraint: self.pred.source -> forAll(n | n.oclIsTypeOf(ucm::map::Connect) implies ( n.contRef=self.contRef and self.contRef=n.pred.source->first().contRef ) )

Rule.Name: UCMstubAtMostOneElse
Rule.Description: UCM stub must not have more than one plug-in with an "else" precondition

Rule.Name: UCMorForkAtMostOneElse
Rule.Description: UCM Or-Fork must not have more than one branch with an "else" condition
